response.original_title: Dead Boys - Return Of The Living Dead Boys Halloween Night
response.overview: The reunion concert that brought New York to it's knees in 1986 - the original Dead Boys, Stiv Bators, Cheetah Chrome, Jimmy Zero, Jeff Magnum and Johnny Blitz on stage at the Ritz!  The band got together for one more show in thir old stomping ground, starting wih an introduction from long-time supporter, Joey Ramone, to the power riff of "Sonic Reducer" (played twice!) to an unreal cover of The Stooges' "Search & Destroy!"
response.title: Dead Boys - Return Of The Living Dead Boys Halloween Night
